title: I Always Will
lyrics:
When morning comes
Up over the hill
And leaves you a new day
On your windowsill
Know I love you still
Oh, and I always will



When the stars steal the sky

Up over the hill

And the moon [?]

On your windowsill

Know I love you still

Oh, and I always will



Wherever life goes

Know you're not alone

Sunlight, shadows

Even when the wind blows



The sun circles back

Up over the hill

And bring you a new day

To your windowsill

Oh, and I love you still

And I always will

Oh, I love you still

And I always will
